Za obisk je primernejši dopoldanski čas
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Tratnik

V Zdravstvenem domu Ajdovščina so občini ustanoviteljici zaprosili za soglasje, s katerim bi ohranili trenutni ordinacijski čas dispanzerja za ženske. Zaradi lažje organizacije dela in za čim bolj kakovostno obravnavo pacientk predlagajo, da bi dispanzer popoldne delal le en dan v tednu, ostale štiri dni pa v dopoldne.



V zdravstvenem domu ocenjujejo, da je en dan popoldanskega dela v dispanzerju za ženske dovolj. Foto: Alenka Tratnik

AJDOVŠČINA > Skladno s Splošnim dogovorom za pogodbeno leto 2019 morajo izvajalci zdravstvenih storitev zagotoviti, da bo vsak izbrani osebni zdravnik, izbrani ginekolog ali izbrani zobozdravnik eno petino s pogodbo dogovorjenega ordinacijskega časa zagotovil v popoldanskem času, in sicer po 16. uri. Za ajdovski dispanzer za ženske bi to pomenilo, da bi tri dni v tednu delal v dopoldanskem času, dva pa v popoldanskem.
Splošni dogovor dopušča tudi izjeme. Na primer v dejavnostih, kjer zaradi diagnostičnih preiskav popoldanski čas ni primeren, pa tudi, če izvajalec utemelji razloge in dobi soglasje lokalne skupnosti.
En dan popoldanskega dela je dovolj
Zadnjo možnost so izkoristili tudi v Ajdovščini, kjer v dispanzerju za ženske trenutno delata dve zdravnici. Ena je upokojena zdravnica, ki dela po pogodbi dva dneva v tednu dopoldne, druga zdravnica dela tri dni v tednu, od tega en dan popoldne.
V zavodu so ocenili, da je en dan popoldanskega dela dovolj, predlog so tudi strokovno utemeljili. “Razlogi za dopoldanske preglede so manjša utrujenost pacientk, lažje in kakovostnejše izvajanje laboratorijskih preiskav, saj morajo biti pacientke pri nekaterih tešče, kri za zahtevnejše preiskave, ki jih izvaja zunanji izvajalec, se odvzema do 9. ure, transport vzorcev za kompleksnejše preiskave v druge laboratorije poteka enkrat dnevno do 13. ure, prav tako tudi transport kužnin. Vse kurativne urgentne primere se vedno obravnava dopoldne, tudi naročanje pacientk na posege v bolnišnicah se praviloma opravlja v dopoldanskem času,” sta v utemeljitvi zapisali zdravnici, specialistki ginekologije.
Čakajo še Ajdovce
“Utemeljitev je potrdil tudi strokovni svet Zdravstvenega doma Ajdovščina in soglašal s predlaganim ordinacijskim časom,” je povedal direktor Zdravstvenega doma Ajdovščina Egon Stopar, ki je predlog že predstavil vipavskim svetnikom. Ti so z njim soglašali, jutri bodo o njem razpravljali tudi ajdovski svetniki.

It is better to visit in the morning
06 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Alenka Tratnik

At the Ajdovščina Health Center, the founding municipalities were asked for their consent in order to preserve the current office hours of the women's dispensary. For the sake of ease of organization of work and for the best possible treatment of patients, it is suggested that the dispensary should work only one day a week in the afternoon and the remaining four days in the morning.



The health center estimates that one day in the afternoon at a women's dispensary is enough. Photo: Alenka Tratnik

AJDOVSKA> In accordance with the General Agreement for the 2019 Contract Year, healthcare providers must ensure that every selected personal doctor, selected gynecologist or selected dentist is guaranteed one-fifth of the agreed office hours by the afternoon. For a Buckwheat Dispensary for Women, this would mean working three days a week in the morning and two in the afternoon.
The general agreement also allows for exceptions. For example, in activities where afternoon testing is not appropriate due to diagnostic tests, even if the contractor justifies the reasons and obtains the consent of the local community.
One day's work is enough
The last option was also used in Ajdovščina, where two women doctors currently work in a women's dispensary. One is a retired doctor working on a contract two days a week in the morning, the other is a doctor working three days a week, one in the afternoon.
The Institute assessed that one day's work was sufficient, and the proposal was justified. “The reasons for the morning examinations are lower patient fatigue, easier and better quality of laboratory tests, since some patients have to be fasted, blood for more demanding extracurricular examinations is taken by 9am, transport of samples for more complex examinations to others. Laboratories are held once a day until 1 pm, as well as transport of contraceptives. All curative emergencies are always dealt with in the morning, and the ordering of patients for hospital interventions is usually done in the morning, ”the gynecology specialist wrote in the justification.
Ajdovce are still waiting
"The justification was also endorsed by the expert council of the Ajdovščina Health Center and agreed with the proposed ordination time," said Ajdovščina Health Center director Egon Stopar, who has already presented the proposal to Vipava councilors. They agreed with him, and tomorrow he will be discussed by the Idaho saints.
